Digital Design Online Portfolio

AXA Wealth Intenational

Two factor authentication (2FA) was added to the AXA Wealth website as a requirement to satisfy their regulatory standards.

The users were required to log in with their user name and password and be automatically sent a One Time Password (OTP) via an SMS text message to their mobile phone.

The user was then required to enter this password to complete the log in process.

The purpose of the document was to provide:

  • New options within the login process to allow a user to register for 2-Factor Authentication.
  • New options within the login process which allow a user to authenticate the second factor before successfully completing the login.
  • Functionality for a staff user to manage their 2FA settings via the existing profile management screens.
  • Functionality to maintain 2FA settings for different users via the user search function.
